title: Get Ready

Text to show gradient color
text: He started with just 17 years to accomplish his dream to work as a freelancer and co-entrepreneur.
Over the years he worked around the world for startups and small businesses. Gained experience in $Design, $Code and professional $team work.

Lukas is known for his work. Trusted with extraordinary work along the beauty of code to create projects people love. In many ways he has groundbreaking knowledge of the most important features of code.

cards.title: Javascript
cards.paragraph: Instead of just giving you the tools to create your own site, they offer you a list of themes you can choose from. Thus a handy product
